languages.text: "Ты не услышал{mf||а} меня, когда я ответил тебе в первый раз? Я не люблю повторяться дважды".
"Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."
languages.original_text: "Ты не услышал{mf||а} меня, когда я ответил тебе в первый раз? Я не люблю повторяться дважды".

traits.locale_text: "Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿No has oído lo que te he dicho la primera vez? No me gusta repetirme».
languages.original_text: "Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."

traits.locale_text: «¿No has oído lo que te he dicho la primera vez? No me gusta repetirme».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我第一次回答你的时候，难道你没听明白吗？我不喜欢重复第二遍。”
languages.original_text: "Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."

traits.locale_text: “我第一次回答你的时候，难道你没听明白吗？我不喜欢重复第二遍。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺の返事を聞いていなかったのか？何度も同じことを言わせないでくれ」
languages.original_text: "Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の返事を聞いていなかったのか？何度も同じことを言わせないでくれ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous êtes {mf|sourd|sourde} ? J'ai déjà répondu à cette question et je déteste me répéter. »
languages.original_text: "Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|sourd|sourde} ? J'ai déjà répondu à cette question et je déteste me répéter. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Habt Ihr mich nicht gehört, als ich Euch das erste Mal geantwortet habe? Ich wiederhole mich nur ungern."
languages.original_text: "Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr mich nicht gehört, als ich Euch das erste Mal geantwortet habe? Ich wiederhole mich nur ungern."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."

languages.text: "Bu sorunun cevabını verdim ya. Aynı şeyleri tekrarlattırma."
languages.original_text: "Did you not hear me when I answered you the first time? I do not like to repeat myself."

traits.locale_text: "Bu sorunun cevabını verdim ya. Aynı şeyleri tekrarlattırma."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
